Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. With its exceptional quality and functionality, it's truly worth every penny. For a limited time, I'm extending an exclusive offer to you at a price of $95. This is a fantastic opportunity to acquire a high-value item at a significant discount. Don't miss out on this chance to enhance your experience with our product. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
